description:
An offline build planner for Path of Exile


What's Changed
Fixed Crashes
- Fix limited processing flag not persisting through recursions causing crash by @Paliak in #8192
User Interface
- Improve breakdown for Snipe's damage mods by @Paliak in #8196
Fixed Calculations
- Fix Damage while Leeching Life mod not working by @LocalIdentity in #8205
Fixed Behaviours
- Fix Sublime Vision disabling Mine skills by @LocalIdentity in #8206
- Fix Snipe for Assailum not working by @Paliak in #8195
Full Changelog: https://github.com/PathOfBuildingCommunity/PathOfBuilding/compare/v2.48.1...v2.48.2
